topic.title: Tested platforms and tools
topic.shortdesc: See which tools and platforms have been used in testing the DITA processing system.

body.p: The DITA processing system has been tested against the following platforms and tools:

strow.stentry: Xalan-J 2.6, Xalan-J 2.7, Saxon 6.5, Saxon 9XSLT 2.0 standard is not officially supported yet, due to the reliance by some users on Xalan.
